vernac_cmds: Inductive sig (A:Type) (P:A -> Prop) : Type := exist : forall x:A, P x -> sig P.
Inductive sig2 (A:Type) (P Q:A -> Prop) : Type := exist2 : forall x:A, P x -> Q x -> sig2 P Q.
Inductive sigT (A:Type) (P:A -> Type) : Type := existT : forall x:A, P x -> sigT P.
Inductive sigT2 (A:Type) (P Q:A -> Type) : Type := existT2 : forall x:A, P x -> Q x -> sigT2 P Q.
Notation "{ x | P }" := (sig (fun x => P)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ x | P & Q }" := (sig2 (fun x => P) (fun x => Q)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ x : A | P }" := (sig (A:=A) (fun x => P)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ x : A | P & Q }" := (sig2 (A:=A) (fun x => P) (fun x => Q)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ x & P }" := (sigT (fun x => P)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ x : A & P }" := (sigT (A:=A) (fun x => P)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ x : A & P & Q }" := (sigT2 (A:=A) (fun x => P) (fun x => Q)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ ' pat | P }" := (sig (fun pat => P)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ ' pat | P & Q }" := (sig2 (fun pat => P) (fun pat => Q)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ ' pat : A | P }" := (sig (A:=A) (fun pat => P)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ ' pat : A | P & Q }" := (sig2 (A:=A) (fun pat => P) (fun pat => Q)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ ' pat : A & P }" := (sigT (A:=A) (fun pat => P)) : type_scope.
Notation "{ ' pat : A & P & Q }" := (sigT2 (A:=A) (fun pat => P) (fun pat => Q)) : type_scope.
Definition proj1_sig (e:sig P) := match e with | exist _ a b => a end.
Definition proj2_sig (e:sig P) := match e return P (proj1_sig e) with | exist _ a b => b end.
Definition sig_of_sig2 (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (X : sig2 P Q) : sig P := exist P (let (a, _, _) := X in a) (let (x, p, _) as s return (P (let (a, _, _) := s in a)) := X in p).
Definition proj3_sig (e : sig2 P Q) := let (a, b, c) return Q (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 e)) := e in c.
Definition projT1 (x:sigT P) : A := match x with | existT _ a _ => a end.
Definition projT2 (x:sigT P) : P (projT1 x) := match x return P (projT1 x) with | existT _ _ h => h end.
Definition sigT_of_sigT2 (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Type) (X : sigT2 P Q) : sigT P := existT P (let (a, _, _) := X in a) (let (x, p, _) as s return (P (let (a, _, _) := s in a)) := X in p).
Definition projT3 (e : sigT2 P Q) := let (a, b, c) return Q (projT1 (sigT_of_sigT2 e)) := e in c.
Definition sig_of_sigT (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (X : sigT P) : sig P := exist P (projT1 X) (projT2 X).
Definition sigT_of_sig (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (X : sig P) : sigT P := existT P (proj1_sig X) (proj2_sig X).
Definition sig2_of_sigT2 (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (X : sigT2 P Q) : sig2 P Q := exist2 P Q (projT1 (sigT_of_sigT2 X)) (projT2 (sigT_of_sigT2 X)) (projT3 X).
Definition sigT2_of_sig2 (A : Type) (P Q : A -> Prop) (X : sig2 P Q) : sigT2 P Q := existT2 P Q (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 X)) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 X)) (proj3_sig X).
Definition sigT_eta {A P} (p : { a : A & P a }) : p = existT _ (projT1 p) (projT2 p).
Definition sig_eta {A P} (p : { a : A | P a }) : p = exist _ (proj1_sig p) (proj2_sig p).
Definition sigT2_eta {A P Q} (p : { a : A & P a & Q a }) : p = existT2 _ _ (projT1 (sigT_of_sigT2 p)) (projT2 (sigT_of_sigT2 p)) (projT3 p).
Definition sig2_eta {A P Q} (p : { a : A | P a & Q a }) : p = exist2 _ _ (proj1_sig (sig_of_sig2 p)) (proj2_sig (sig_of_sig2 p)) (proj3_sig p).
Lemma exists_to_inhabited_sig {A P} : (exists x : A, P x) -> inhabited {x : A | P x}.
Lemma inhabited_sig_to_exists {A P} : inhabited {x : A | P x} -> exists x : A, P x.
Local Notation "'rew' 'dependent' H 'in' H'" := (match H with | eq_refl => H' end) (at level 10, H' at level 10, format "'[' 'rew' 'dependent' '/ ' H in '/' H' ']'").
Definition projT1_eq {A} {P : A -> Type} {u v : { a : A & P a }} (p : u = v) : projT1 u = projT1 v := f_equal (@projT1 _ _) p.
Definition projT2_eq {A} {P : A -> Type} {u v : { a : A & P a }} (p : u = v) : rew projT1_eq p in projT2 u = projT2 v := rew dependent p in eq_refl.
Definition eq_existT_uncurried {A : Type} {P : A -> Type} {u1 v1 : A} {u2 : P u1} {v2 : P v1} (pq : { p : u1 = v1 & rew p in u2 = v2 }) : existT _ u1 u2 = existT _ v1 v2.
Definition eq_sigT_uncurried {A : Type} {P : A -> Type} (u v : { a : A & P a }) (pq : { p : projT1 u = projT1 v & rew p in projT2 u = projT2 v }) : u = v.
destruct u as [u1 u2], v as [v1 v2]; simpl in *.
Definition eq_sigT {A : Type} {P : A -> Type} (u v : { a : A & P a }) (p : projT1 u = projT1 v) (q : rew p in projT2 u = projT2 v) : u = v := eq_sigT_uncurried u v (existT _ p q).
Definition eq_sigT_hprop {A P} (P_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : P x), p = q) (u v : { a : A & P a }) (p : projT1 u = projT1 v) : u = v := eq_sigT u v p (P_hprop _ _ _).
Definition eq_sigT_uncurried_iff {A P} (u v : { a : A & P a }) : u = v <-> { p : projT1 u = projT1 v & rew p in projT2 u = projT2 v }.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sigT_uncurried ].
Definition eq_sigT_rect {A P} {u v : { a : A & P a }} (Q : u = v -> Type) (f : forall p q, Q (eq_sigT u v p q)) : forall p, Q p.
intro p; specialize (f (projT1_eq p) (projT2_eq p)); destruct u, p; exact f.
Definition eq_sigT_rec {A P u v} (Q : u = v :> { a : A & P a } -> Set) := eq_sigT_rect Q.
Definition eq_sigT_ind {A P u v} (Q : u = v :> { a : A & P a } -> Prop) := eq_sigT_rec Q.

Definition eq_sigT_hprop_iff {A P} (P_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : P x), p = q) (u v : { a : A & P a }) : u = v <-> (projT1 u = projT1 v) := conj (fun p => f_equal (@projT1 _ _) p) (eq_sigT_hprop P_hprop u v).
Definition eq_sigT_nondep {A B : Type} (u v : { a : A & B }) (p : projT1 u = projT1 v) (q : projT2 u = projT2 v) : u = v := @eq_sigT _ _ u v p (eq_trans (rew_const _ _) q).

Lemma rew_sigT {A x} {P : A -> Type} (Q : forall a, P a -> Prop) (u : { p : P x & Q x p }) {y} (H : x = y) : rew [fun a => { p : P a & Q a p }] H in u = existT (Q y) (rew H in projT1 u) (rew dependent H in (projT2 u)).
Definition proj1_sig_eq {A} {P : A -> Prop} {u v : { a : A | P a }} (p : u = v) : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v := f_equal (@proj1_sig _ _) p.
Definition proj2_sig_eq {A} {P : A -> Prop} {u v : { a : A | P a }} (p : u = v) : rew proj1_sig_eq p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v := rew dependent p in eq_refl.
Definition eq_exist_uncurried {A : Type} {P : A -> Prop} {u1 v1 : A} {u2 : P u1} {v2 : P v1} (pq : { p : u1 = v1 | rew p in u2 = v2 }) : exist _ u1 u2 = exist _ v1 v2.
Definition eq_sig_uncurried {A : Type} {P : A -> Prop} (u v : { a : A | P a }) (pq : { p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | rew p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v }) : u = v.
destruct u as [u1 u2], v as [v1 v2]; simpl in *.
Definition eq_sig {A : Type} {P : A -> Prop} (u v : { a : A | P a }) (p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v) (q : rew p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v) : u = v := eq_sig_uncurried u v (exist _ p q).
Definition eq_sig_rect {A P} {u v : { a : A | P a }} (Q : u = v -> Type) (f : forall p q, Q (eq_sig u v p q)) : forall p, Q p.
intro p; specialize (f (proj1_sig_eq p) (proj2_sig_eq p)); destruct u, p; exact f.
Definition eq_sig_rec {A P u v} (Q : u = v :> { a : A | P a } -> Set) := eq_sig_rect Q.
Definition eq_sig_ind {A P u v} (Q : u = v :> { a : A | P a } -> Prop) := eq_sig_rec Q.
Definition eq_sig_hprop {A} {P : A -> Prop} (P_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : P x), p = q) (u v : { a : A | P a }) (p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v) : u = v := eq_sig u v p (P_hprop _ _ _).
Definition eq_sig_uncurried_iff {A} {P : A -> Prop} (u v : { a : A | P a }) : u = v <-> { p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | rew p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v }.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sig_uncurried ].

Definition eq_sig_hprop_iff {A} {P : A -> Prop} (P_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : P x), p = q) (u v : { a : A | P a }) : u = v <-> (proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v) := conj (fun p => f_equal (@proj1_sig _ _) p) (eq_sig_hprop P_hprop u v).

Lemma rew_sig {A x} {P : A -> Type} (Q : forall a, P a -> Prop) (u : { p : P x | Q x p }) {y} (H : x = y) : rew [fun a => { p : P a | Q a p }] H in u = exist (Q y) (rew H in proj1_sig u) (rew dependent H in proj2_sig u).
Definition sigT_of_sigT2_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Type} {u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : u = v :> { a : A & P a } := f_equal _ p.
Definition projT1_of_sigT2_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Type} {u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : projT1 u = projT1 v := projT1_eq (sigT_of_sigT2_eq p).
Definition projT2_of_sigT2_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Type} {u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : rew projT1_of_sigT2_eq p in projT2 u = projT2 v := rew dependent p in eq_refl.
Definition projT3_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Type} {u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : rew projT1_of_sigT2_eq p in projT3 u = projT3 v := rew dependent p in eq_refl.

Definition eq_existT2_uncurried {A : Type} {P Q : A -> Type} {u1 v1 : A} {u2 : P u1} {v2 : P v1} {u3 : Q u1} {v3 : Q v1} (pqr : { p : u1 = v1 & rew p in u2 = v2 & rew p in u3 = v3 }) : existT2 _ _ u1 u2 u3 = existT2 _ _ v1 v2 v3.
Definition eq_sigT2_uncurried {A : Type} {P Q : A -> Type} (u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }) (pqr : { p : projT1 u = projT1 v & rew p in projT2 u = projT2 v & rew p in projT3 u = projT3 v }) : u = v.
destruct u as [u1 u2 u3], v as [v1 v2 v3]; simpl in *.

Definition eq_sigT2 {A : Type} {P Q : A -> Type} (u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }) (p : projT1 u = projT1 v) (q : rew p in projT2 u = projT2 v) (r : rew p in projT3 u = projT3 v) : u = v := eq_sigT2_uncurried u v (existT2 _ _ p q r).

Definition eq_sigT2_hprop {A P Q} (Q_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : Q x), p = q) (u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }) (p : u = v :> { a : A & P a }) : u = v := eq_sigT2 u v (projT1_eq p) (projT2_eq p) (Q_hprop _ _ _).
Definition eq_sigT2_uncurried_iff {A P Q} (u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }) : u = v <-> { p : projT1 u = projT1 v & rew p in projT2 u = projT2 v & rew p in projT3 u = projT3 v }.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sigT2_uncurried ].
Definition eq_sigT2_rect {A P Q} {u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }} (R : u = v -> Type) (f : forall p q r, R (eq_sigT2 u v p q r)) : forall p, R p.
Definition eq_sigT2_rec {A P Q u v} (R : u = v :> { a : A & P a & Q a } -> Set) := eq_sigT2_rect R.
Definition eq_sigT2_ind {A P Q u v} (R : u = v :> { a : A & P a & Q a } -> Prop) := eq_sigT2_rec R.

Definition eq_sigT2_hprop_iff {A P Q} (Q_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : Q x), p = q) (u v : { a : A & P a & Q a }) : u = v <-> (u = v :> { a : A & P a }) := conj (fun p => f_equal (@sigT_of_sigT2 _ _ _) p) (eq_sigT2_hprop Q_hprop u v).

Definition eq_sigT2_nondep {A B C : Type} (u v : { a : A & B & C }) (p : projT1 u = projT1 v) (q : projT2 u = projT2 v) (r : projT3 u = projT3 v) : u = v := @eq_sigT2 _ _ _ u v p (eq_trans (rew_const _ _) q) (eq_trans (rew_const _ _) r).

Lemma rew_sigT2 {A x} {P : A -> Type} (Q R : forall a, P a -> Prop) (u : { p : P x & Q x p & R x p }) {y} (H : x = y) : rew [fun a => { p : P a & Q a p & R a p }] H in u = existT2 (Q y) (R y) (rew H in projT1 u) (rew dependent H in projT2 u) (rew dependent H in projT3 u).
Definition sig_of_sig2_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} {u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : u = v :> { a : A | P a } := f_equal _ p.
Definition proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} {u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v := proj1_sig_eq (sig_of_sig2_eq p).
Definition proj2_sig_of_sig2_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} {u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : rew proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v := rew dependent p in eq_refl.
Definition proj3_sig_eq {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} {u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }} (p : u = v) : rew proj1_sig_of_sig2_eq p in proj3_sig u = proj3_sig v := rew dependent p in eq_refl.

Definition eq_exist2_uncurried {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} {u1 v1 : A} {u2 : P u1} {v2 : P v1} {u3 : Q u1} {v3 : Q v1} (pqr : { p : u1 = v1 | rew p in u2 = v2 & rew p in u3 = v3 }) : exist2 _ _ u1 u2 u3 = exist2 _ _ v1 v2 v3.

Definition eq_sig2_uncurried {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} (u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }) (pqr : { p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | rew p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v & rew p in proj3_sig u = proj3_sig v }) : u = v.
destruct u as [u1 u2 u3], v as [v1 v2 v3]; simpl in *.

Definition eq_sig2 {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} (u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }) (p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v) (q : rew p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v) (r : rew p in proj3_sig u = proj3_sig v) : u = v := eq_sig2_uncurried u v (exist2 _ _ p q r).

Definition eq_sig2_hprop {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} (Q_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : Q x), p = q) (u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }) (p : u = v :> { a : A | P a }) : u = v := eq_sig2 u v (proj1_sig_eq p) (proj2_sig_eq p) (Q_hprop _ _ _).
Definition eq_sig2_uncurried_iff {A P Q} (u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }) : u = v <-> { p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v | rew p in proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v & rew p in proj3_sig u = proj3_sig v }.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sig2_uncurried ].
Definition eq_sig2_rect {A P Q} {u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }} (R : u = v -> Type) (f : forall p q r, R (eq_sig2 u v p q r)) : forall p, R p.
Definition eq_sig2_rec {A P Q u v} (R : u = v :> { a : A | P a & Q a } -> Set) := eq_sig2_rect R.
Definition eq_sig2_ind {A P Q u v} (R : u = v :> { a : A | P a & Q a } -> Prop) := eq_sig2_rec R.

Definition eq_sig2_hprop_iff {A} {P Q : A -> Prop} (Q_hprop : forall (x : A) (p q : Q x), p = q) (u v : { a : A | P a & Q a }) : u = v <-> (u = v :> { a : A | P a }) := conj (fun p => f_equal (@sig_of_sig2 _ _ _) p) (eq_sig2_hprop Q_hprop u v).

Definition eq_sig2_nondep {A} {B C : Prop} (u v : @sig2 A (fun _ => B) (fun _ => C)) (p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v) (q : proj2_sig u = proj2_sig v) (r : proj3_sig u = proj3_sig v) : u = v := @eq_sig2 _ _ _ u v p (eq_trans (rew_const _ _) q) (eq_trans (rew_const _ _) r).

Lemma rew_sig2 {A x} {P : A -> Type} (Q R : forall a, P a -> Prop) (u : { p : P x | Q x p & R x p }) {y} (H : x = y) : rew [fun a => { p : P a | Q a p & R a p }] H in u = exist2 (Q y) (R y) (rew H in proj1_sig u) (rew dependent H in proj2_sig u) (rew dependent H in proj3_sig u).
Inductive sumbool (A B:Prop) : Set := | left : A -> {A} + {B} | right : B -> {A} + {B} where "{ A } + { B }" := (sumbool A B) : type_scope.
Inductive sumor (A:Type) (B:Prop) : Type := | inleft : A -> A + {B} | inright : B -> A + {B} where "A + { B }" := (sumor A B) : type_scope.
Lemma Choice : (forall x:S, {y:S' | R x y}) -> {f:S -> S' | forall z:S, R z (f z)}.
Lemma Choice2 : (forall x:S, {y:S' & R' x y}) -> {f:S -> S' & forall z:S, R' z (f z)}.
Lemma bool_choice : (forall x:S, {R1 x} + {R2 x}) -> {f:S -> bool | forall x:S, f x = true /\ R1 x \/ f x = false /\ R2 x}.
exists (fun z:S => if H z then true else false).
Lemma dependent_choice : (forall x:X, {y | R x y}) -> forall x0, {f : nat -> X | f O = x0 /\ forall n, R (f n) (f (S n))}.
set (f:=fix f n := match n with O => x0 | S n' => proj1_sig (H (f n')) end).
Theorem absurd_set : forall (A:Prop) (C:Set), A -> ~ A -> C.
Hint Resolve left right inleft inright: core.
Hint Resolve exist exist2 existT existT2: core.

command: destruct u as [u1 u2], v as [v1 v2]; simpl in *.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sigT_uncurried ].
intro p; specialize (f (projT1_eq p) (projT2_eq p)); destruct u, p; exact f.
destruct u as [u1 u2], v as [v1 v2]; simpl in *.
intro p; specialize (f (proj1_sig_eq p) (proj2_sig_eq p)); destruct u, p; exact f.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sig_uncurried ].
destruct u as [u1 u2 u3], v as [v1 v2 v3]; simpl in *.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sigT2_uncurried ].
destruct u as [u1 u2 u3], v as [v1 v2 v3]; simpl in *.
split; [ intro; subst; exists eq_refl; reflexivity | apply eq_sig2_uncurried ].
exists (fun z:S => if H z then true else false).
set (f:=fix f n := match n with O => x0 | S n' => proj1_sig (H (f n')) end).
